span.p: Minecraft is one of the most popular video games of all time, with more than 122 million copies sold. Minecraft inspires players to create together and has created one of the most active and passionate player communities in the world.

As the Minecraft Data Architect, you will have a holistic view of the entire data architecture and be responsible for the data roadmap, stability and maintenance of all data solutions both the Minecraft Data Science team and the studio depend on. This role requires continual engagement with our embedded Data Science function to ensure we have the appropriate technical infrastructure in place to enable data informed decisions.

An appropriate candidate will have deep technical knowledge of BI systems design, big data architecture and technology landscape, service architecture, ETL/ELT orchestration, business intelligence tools such as Power BI as well as large scale event telemetry ingestion and aggregation systems. The candidate should have excellent organizational and communication skills and feel comfortable in a fast pace continues delivery agile environment.

So, if you are you an expert in both architecting and maintaining business intelligence systems and are fascinated by how analytics driven organizations can transform data into actionable insights, we have a dream job for you!
Key Responsibilities:
• Design, implement and monitor a full life cycle enterprise data
architecture
• Responsible for the monitoring and stability of all data solutions
• Define, communicate and execute the data architecture
roadmap
• Provide technical leadership to the Minecraft Data Science
Team
• Ensure best practices around data privacy and data
governance
Operational Responsibilities
• Participate in all development projects to ensure the data
architecture guidelines are applied
• Establish and maintain regular updates detailing, current
issues, cost, and development progress
• Maintain performance and availability by identifying and
resolving production and application issues as they arise
• Direct research on potential technology solutions,
implementations and budgeting in support of new initiatives
and opportunities
Minimum Qualifications:
• Bachelor’s Degree or 5 years software engineering experience
Preferred Qualifications:
• We are looking for a skilled and experienced Data Architect
with an extensive background in working with and designing
large scale data architectures
• Proven background and strong hands on experience with one
or more of the following Big Data technology stacks: Hadoop in
the cloud, MPP SQL (Hive preferred), ETL orchestration
systems
• The architect will be highly accomplished in engineering in big
data environments
• Strong software engineering background and understanding of
the software development lifecycle
• The architect shall understand and work with relational and
non-relational databases
• Ability to effectively prioritize and execute tasks in a high‐
pressure environment
• Ability to express complex technical concepts effectively, both
verbally and in writing
• Highly self‐motivated, self‐directed and attentive to detail
• Influences without authority
• Strategic thinker, combined with strong ability to execute
• Solid verbal and written communication

Our processes include requirements analysis, continuous development cycle, integration from multi partner orgs and teams, enhancement, maintenance, testing, customer scenario evaluations and root cause analysis/resolution.
